hymn.title: A Place for Everything
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: A place for ev -- ery -- thing, for ev -- ery -- thing a place. Our shoes! Our toys! Oh, girls and boys! Put each thing in its place!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2014 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: A place for everything, for everything a place. Our shoes! Our toys! Oh, girls and boys! Put each thing in its place!
A place for everything, for everything a place. My bat and bike, my skates and trike Put each thing in its place!
A place for everything, for everything a place. My plate I think goes in the sink! Put each thing in its place!
A place for everything, for everything a place. Our hats and coats, our boots and totes Put each thing in its place!
